body.p: If you prefer a graphic interface, use pgAdmin 4. This GUI client supports PostgreSQL databases with all standard pgAdmin 4 features, while adding support for some Greenplum-specific features. pgAdmin 4 is available for download at .
pgAdmin 4 supports the following Greenplum-specific features:

ul.li: Append-optimized tables, including compressed append-optimized tables. Only limited functionality for Greenplum partitioned tables is available with pgAdmin 4.

body.note: Graphical EXPLAIN features are currently not available with Greenplum Database.
For limitations on using pgAdmin4 with Greenplum Database, refer to the Greenplum Database Release Notes.
